talk.author: did:plc:2l2ykiifazl2syeu6g4ug6br
talk.utter: I think you are confusing House leadership with campaign leadership.  They are two separate things with two separate foci.  That's why you don't see Jeffries heading up the DNC.

talk.author: did:plc:ve3q25p65yscbkqivw2b2dct
talk.utter: You think there's any difference in the mind of the average eligible voter when they're deciding whether or not to show up?

talk.author: did:plc:2l2ykiifazl2syeu6g4ug6br
talk.utter: People vote for THEIR representatives.  That's what they show up for.  Not some broad philosophical bullshit.  If the person they're voting for helps them, they'll send him/her back.  If he/she doesn't, they'll either not vote or vote against him/her.  It's pretty simple.
